Articles.Content:
what are some easter eggs you might want in ksp2? Here are some that i might be interested in

  • tributes to the original game
  • terrain locations seen in the trailer
  • some returns, though not to many
I don't mean to be a party pooper, but isn't the point of easter eggs that they are a surprise? You can't request them!

Sub-oceanic trigonal star-map (Knights of the Old Republic)

Lightning (if weather systems are present), which on extremely rare occasions will interfere with controls

No shortage of flavor text references to various books and movies

I think we already have walnut Iapetus reference. Now we need a Death-Star/Pac-Man Mimas reference, and Mass Relay-sticking-out-of-the-surface Charon reference.
I hope there will be few, and they will be hard to discover. The last thing I want is to have it larded with pop culture references and fan service.
It would be cool if there was secret lore on other planets in the form of easter eggs.
